title: Reasons for watching reality TV in the U.S. 2017 , by age
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Races on X-axis for 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
For Race None of these, 55+ had the highest Share of respondents 59.0 among the 5 groups and in I'm invested, 55+ had the lowest Share of respondents 2.0.
Race None of these and To connect with likeminded viewers had the biggest gap of 45.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 45-54.
Averaging all 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+, the Race None of these is the maximum Share of respondents and To connect with likeminded viewers is the minimum Share of respondents.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Races on X-axis for 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Race None of these had the maximum Share of respondents among all 5 groups, and it was for 55+. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Race I'm invested for 55+.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Races on X-axis for 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
For Race None of these, 55+ had the highest Share of respondents 59.0 among the 5 groups and in I'm invested, 55+ had the lowest Share of respondents 2.0.
Race None of these and To connect with likeminded viewers had the biggest gap of 45.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 45-54.
Averaging all 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+, the Race None of these is the maximum Share of respondents and To connect with likeminded viewers is the minimum Share of respondents.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 10 different Races for 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+ that are presented on the X-axis.
Race None of these had the maximum Share of respondents among all 5 groups, and it was for 55+. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Race I'm invested for 55+.
Among all the Races, 45-54 had the highest Share of respondents in Race None of these and lowest Share of respondents in Race To connect with likeminded viewers.
There is a gap of 45.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 45-54 in Race None of these and To connect with likeminded viewers.
Out of all 5 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents was found in case of 45-54.
55+ had the maximum Share of respondents out of all 5 groups in Race None of these followed by 55+ in None of these, and the minimum Share of respondents is found for 55+ in I'm invested.

On average, the Race None of these had the highest Share of respondents for all 5 groups 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, and 55+. Whereas To connect with likeminded viewers had the lowest average Share of respondents.

data.Race: It helps me forget about real issues in my life/in the world
It helps me stay informed about popular culture
